document_data.name: Cornelius Worthywart
document_data.mainbody:
'''Cornelius Worthywart''' was a [[halfling]] who lived in the Realms during the late 14{{th}} or 15{{th}} centuries [[DR]].
{{Quote|Wasn't I there when the blue fire took it? Sure what do you remember—you were knee-high to a [[gnome]].|Cornelius to Tomelius, regarding Luiren and the Spellplague.}}
document_data.Personality: He believed that his ancestral home of [[Luiren]] was consumed in the blue fire of the [[Spellplague]].
document_data.History: One day, while venturing through the [[Fireshear Mountains]], Cornelius and his brother Tomelius came across a [[dragonborn]] author. The writer took the brothers' accounts of the halfling realm of Luiren, including their opposing viewpoints. Their words were immortalized in the compendium ''[[Oral Histories of Faerûn]]''.
